comment._content: I think it is not a painting but a photography with ink (sepia) enhancings…

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
We looked at this photo with a magnifying glass, we're almost sure it's a photo of a painting.  His hair, the area under his nose, and his shirt look like a painting and not like a photograph of a real person.  If you click on the “All Sizes” icon above the image, you may be able to see what we're referring to. 

 Thanks for your interest!!

comment.author: 94961398@N00
comment._content: Well I looked at this image at its biggest size but I'm still thinking it's not a painting, just a photography with ink and pencil (on the shirt) on it… anyway your posts are really great!

comment.author: 95762360@N00
comment._content:
After staring at it forever, I agree with Alain.  The only evidence of painting is on the badly done parts, which makes it seem odd that they could get some shading so perfect, and then glob on a bunch around his nose.

  /two years too late
